item.title: Applied Minerals Inc 10-K
item.description: Applied Minerals Inc, which is in the Mining, Quarrying Of Nonmetallic Minerals (No Fuels) [1400] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 18, 2022 had 22136 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
